attributes.action: Move Chirstmas Day to July to benifit from the warmer weather!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we move Chritmas to July not only would we benifit from the warmer weather we would also suffer less from the colds and flus going around at such an important time of the year and we could be tanned in our new Christmas outfits!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
